item.title: Rubbish recycling bins, 25th October
item.description:

item.title: Sunken Road Surface, 25th October
item.description:
Part of the road surface outside Nos 79 and 81 Chinbrook Road has sunken in quite significantly (due to settlement) where roadworks / excavations have been carried out in the past. The section on road outside 79 & 81 Chinbrook Road is dangerous because of this and really needs resurfacing and backfilling. Please can these remedial works be carried out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chinbrook Road, Chinbrook, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard and pelican crossing pole in middle of new cycle path, 25th October
item.description:
First just a pelican crossing pole badly placed in the pathway then worsened by a later addition of a bollard so cyclist have to either squeeze through a tiny gap risking falling off or go onto pedestrians section - what idiot designed this itâ€™s ridiculous and dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 106, Wickham Road, Beckenham, London

item.title: Gas canisters and oil containers still not dealt with., 25th October
item.description:

item.title: On the pavement of Exeter Road behind the electric bike parking bay and opposite Jubilee Heights carpark entrances, 25th October
item.description:
This rubbish has been reported three times already and has now moved to to the opposite side of the Exeter Road. Over the last few days, I have cleared way several items of the carelessly discarded litter that this uncollected rubbish is attracting. I have not heard back from the council for days now.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Exeter Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
